author: @LukeBarousse
text: Get this guy some coffee, he keeps calling Trend Lines: Reference Lines.... 🤷🏼‍♂️ On a serious note, I wanted to cover trend lines for this series over reference lines as they are more complex.  Once you understand trend lines, reference lines are super simple to create and you just utilize a value (such as a parameter) to mark a line on your visual.  Try both out!
